subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4171 is on the way
description_text:
Hello, Can you provide details on how to return or cancel this order, it is no longer required. Kind regards, David Sent from my iPhone On 3 Dec 2025, at 07:47, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿

conversations.body_text: Hi David Kerr,    As we have not yet established a UK warehouse, you will need to send the parcel to our German warehouse address. We will process your refund once we have received and inspected the item.  Gubitz GmbH(LeiXuan A211) Hüttenkamp 12 Neumünster,Schleswig-Holstein   24536 +49 17622233089
